dimensions.name: Git Hygiene & History
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Extract git log with --oneline --reverse. Analyze commit atomicity and setup -> tools -> graph progression.
dimensions.success_pattern: Multiple commits with logical progression and clear, atomic changes.
dimensions.failure_pattern: Single 'init' or 'chore' commit with bulky changes. No logical setup-to-completion milestones.
dimensions.synthesis_rules: TechLead weights heaviest for production-grade history. Penalize if messages are non-descriptive.

dimensions.name: Graph Orchestration
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Analyze AST for StateGraph usage. Verify fan-out (detectives/judges) and fan-in (aggregator/justice). Check for reducers.
dimensions.success_pattern: Parallel branches found for detectives and judges. Proper fan-in to aggregator and chief justice nodes. operator.add/ior used.
dimensions.failure_pattern: Linear node execution. State overwriting due to missing reducers. Incorrect fan-out/fan-in wiring.
dimensions.synthesis_rules: Strict adherence to parallel patterns required for score > 3.

dimensions.name: Safe Tool Engineering
dimensions.forensic_instruction: Scan for sandboxing (tempfile), URL sanitization (is_safe_url), and safe execution (subprocess.run without shell=True).
dimensions.success_pattern: Isolated temp directories used for git ops. URLs validated before cloning. All external calls sandboxed.
dimensions.failure_pattern: Raw os.system or shell=True used. No URL validation. Writing to permanent local directories.
dimensions.synthesis_rules: Prosecutor Veto: If score is 1, overall audit cap at 2.0.
